plot: Laichun, her father and two mothers, uncle and grandfather are of different generations; thus they all think differently. Father is the family head, and because he believes he must continue...
title: Dang ai lai de shi hou
plot_es: Laichun, her father and two mothers, uncle and grandfather are of different generations; thus they all think differently. Father is the family head, and because he believes he must continue...
original_name: Dang ai lai de shi hou
